description: Discover an easy and fast winter warmer in this decadent beef and mushroom ragout.
keywords: Ragout,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Mushroom,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Dinner Made Easy,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Beef & Mushroom Ragout Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt McCormicks Beef & Mushroom Ragout Recipe Base

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a frypan over a high heat. Add beef and cook, stirring occasionally, until brown. Add mushrooms and continue cooking for 3 minutes.
Add McCormickâ€™s recipe base and 3/4 cup of water to frypan and stir well to combine. Reduce heat to simmer and cook, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until slightly thickened.
Cook pasta as per pack instructions. Divide pasta among serving bowls, top with beef and mushroom ragout and serve.
